mapper.select: SELECT reply_no, /*댓글번호*/ content, /*댓글내용*/ writer, /*작성자 번호*/ board_no, /*게시판번호*/ COALESCE((SELECT member_nm FROM member where member_no = writer), '') as writer_nm, /*작성자명*/ COALESCE(mod_dt, reg_dt) AS reg_dt /*생성일*/ FROM reply WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND board_no = #{boardNo} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( content, /*댓글내용*/ writer, /*작성자*/ board_no, /*게시판번호*/ reg_dt /*생성일*/ ) values ( #{content}, /*댓글내용*/ #{writer}, /*작성자*/ #{boardNo}, /*게시판번호*/ NOW() /*생성일*/ )
mapper.update: UPDATE reply SET content = #{content}, /*댓글내용*/ mod_dt = now() /*수정일*/ WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} /*게시판번호*/ AND reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.delete: UPDATE reply SET del_yn = 'Y', /*삭제여부*/ mod_dt = now() /*수정일*/ WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} /*게시판번호*/ AND reply_no = #{replyNo} /*댓글번호*/
UPDATE reply SET del_yn = 'Y', /*삭제여부*/ mod_dt = now() /*수정일*/ WHERE board_no = #{boardNo} /*게시판번호*/
